success.text: Your request has been sent successfully.

professionalism.title: Professionalism
professionalism.description: The center employs more than 20 doctors and over 30 medical specialists, of whom more than 10 hold scientific degrees and honorary titles, are members of prestigious medical associations, and 90% are top-level and first-class specialists.

equipment.title: High-Tech Equipment
equipment.description: The clinic is equipped with the most modern, high-precision equipment from countries such as Germany, Italy, Finland, Switzerland, Japan, and South Korea, which makes treatment three times more effective and of higher quality.

convenience.title: Convenience
convenience.description: The clinic operates on an 'all-in-one' system, meaning the patient receives all necessary services without leaving the clinic. It has state-of-the-art MRI and CT diagnostics, ultrasound, endoscopic and laser technologies.

innovations.title: Innovations
innovations.description: Every year, the clinic strives to implement the latest innovations. For example, it is the only clinic performing intervertebral hernia surgeries using endoscopic and laser technologies.

safety.title: Safety
safety.description: The clinic uses a six-step sterilization system for all tools and equipment. After each patient, all surfaces are thoroughly sterilized.

comfort.title: Comfortable Environment
comfort.description: The clinic ensures that every patient has a comfortable stay. High service standards include convenient working hours, an individual approach to each visitor, and attentive and caring staff.

question.title: Have a question?
question.description: Fill out the form below and we’ll get back to you shortly.

about.weAreHappy: We are always happy to help
about.title: About the Clinic
paragraphs: “Humo Med” is a modern multidisciplinary medical centre in Tashkent specializing in in-depth diagnostics and treatment of cardiovascular diseases, abdominal disorders, nasal (ENT) conditions, bone injuries, neurological diseases and urological disorders.
Our centre employs highly qualified doctors and experienced medical specialists. Each specialist has substantial experience and uses advanced methods and modern technologies to help patients.

Humo Med provides comprehensive services in: cardiovascular diagnostics and treatment; abdominal organ diseases; ENT issues; orthopedic care for bone injuries; neurology; urology; procedure services for patients; ultrasound examinations; and laboratory blood tests.

Working on the “all-in-one” principle, the centre ensures that patients receive all necessary diagnostics and treatments in one place. Modern ultrasound, laboratory and diagnostic equipment guarantee convenience and accuracy.
Humo Med places strong emphasis on safety and quality, following strict sterilization and sanitation protocols.
about.advantagesTitle: 6 advantages of treatment at Humo Med:

advantages.title: Professionalism.
advantages.desc: A team of experienced and qualified doctors.

advantages.title: Convenience.
advantages.desc: All services available in one place — “all in one”.

advantages.title: Innovations.
advantages.desc: Applying the latest advances in diagnostics and therapy.

advantages.title: Safety.
advantages.desc: A multi-stage sterilization system and strict sanitation control.

advantages.title: Comfort.
advantages.desc: Individual and attentive approach to every patient.
